summary: This test module validates the health burden calculations of the simulation framework. It defines a simple disease class that can impose disability or death, provides helper utilities, and contains a suite of unit tests that check arithmetic of life years lost, DALY computations, disability aggregation, stacked calculations, cause registration, mapper generation, and the execution of a simulation run with dummy diseases.
business_intent: To verify that the health burden components correctly compute disability-adjusted life years, life years lost, and related metrics, and that they integrate properly with the simulation's disease and cause registration mechanisms.
